Uses of Package
net.viktorc.pspp.core

  • Classes in net.viktorc.pspp.core used by net.viktorc.pspp.core 
    Class and Description
    CommandListener
    A listener that allows for the processing of the outputs of a process.
    CommandSubmission
    A class that holds all information necessary for executing and processing commands in #ProcessManager instances.
    ProcessListener
    An interface for listeners for the #ProcessManager class.
    ProcessManager
    A class for starting, managing, and interacting with processes.
    ProcessManagerException
    An exception thrown by the #ProcessManager class if an unexpected error occurs that solicits that instantaneous termination of the process.
